ModulePrefs.name: com.streamwork.brinkmd.phx4streamwork.cdndemo
ModulePrefs.title: An updated example for Phoenix in streamwork (CDN version)
ModulePrefs.description: Demonstrates how to use version 1.44.3-SNAPSHOT of the Phoenix rendering in the Streamwork environment. This is the dev version using some local development server. In this example, Phoenix is consumed from the CDN.
ModulePrefs.author: Daniel Brinkmann
